unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My Nani from Kerala swears by it! Says since 1975, pesticides are *paap*. Heard IIT Kharagpur is doing cool research on it. Costs a bit more, like Rs. 50/kg for organic rice, but worth it. I think even farmers in Punjab are giving it a try now. Saw a program on DD Kisan at 17:00 hrs, 26/01/2024 about it. Makes sense for our health on 02/10/2024 Gandhi Jayanti also.
